stories.headline: UK doubles troops in Norway to counter Russian 'threat to Arctic'
stories.description: Defence Secretary John Healey says British personnel in Norway will rise from 1,000 to 2,000 over three years.

stories.headline: In Ukraine’s west, Hungarian minority rights collide with wartime politics
stories.description: In Zakarpattia, ordinary life continues as an old dispute between neighbouring nations rocks regional geopolitics.

stories.headline: Kingsbury School: Boy, 13, questioned after two students stabbed
stories.description: The investigation into the attack at a London school is being led by counter-terrorism officers.

stories.headline: Tumbler Ridge mass shooting: What we know about Canada’s school attack
stories.description: At least 9 people were killed, 26 injured; authorities described the suspect as a ‘female in a dress with brown hair’.

stories.headline: More Palestinians return to Gaza via Rafah as Israeli attacks continue
stories.description: Those returning to Gaza describe being subjected to humiliating searches and interrogations by the Israeli military.
